channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dumped rubbish outside back of pizza hit, 31st August
item.description:
Please can you clear this dumped rubbish and boxes which are blocking the pavement. Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 31, Vestry Road, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road drain completely blocked, 31st August
item.description:
Have tried unblocking using extra long rods and pressure water but road floods when raining and flows in to gardens of number 2 and 4
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Barnes Cray Road, Barnes Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Union flags on Nuxley Road lamp posts, 31st August
item.description:
Union flags put up on lamp posts in my road are an aggressive act of nationalism bordering on intimidation and racism. By allowing these flags to continue to fly on council property, lamp posts, it can be assumed that Bexley Council is in agreement with this. I would like to see action to remove these flags as it is a form of illegal posting.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 106a, Nuxley Road, Upper Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loud music noise and antisocial behaviour, 31st August
item.description:
Drunk people at 82 Regents court. Playing loud music, and standing outside their rented flat to loudly talking, screaming and laughing whilst drunk! 2am in the morning! Absolutely disgusting behaviour, people with families and kids can't sleep! DISGUSTING!
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Pownall Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large unavoidable pothole on approach to roundabout, 31st August
item.description:
This pothole is large and deep and is becoming more and more unavoidable due to oncoming traffic and parked cars on the road. It has been present for a while now.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oakdale Road, Nunhead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Inconsiderate parking, 31st August
item.description:
Pedestrians pushchairs and disabled cannot pass the cars on the pavement they have to go into the rd hard to see oncoming traffic due to parking on corners

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Goldcrest Close, Thamesmead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned vehicle with severe fire damage, 31st August
item.description:
There is a blue Volkswagen Golf diesel vehicle that caught fire on 24/08/2025 at 21:11 hrs. London Fire Brigade had attended the scene to neutralise the blaze. The vehicle has been abandoned and continues to pose a fire and health risk.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Homerton Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large amount of flytipping in railway arch, 31st August
item.description:
There is constant flytipping in the railway arches arches. A longterm solution needs to be found.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Rail Sidings Road, Bermondsey, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 13 & 15 Richborough Close decided to flytip rubbish next to lamppost, 31st August
item.description:
Woman from 15 Richborough opened side gate and dumped her rubbish then a few hours later guy from 13 dumped a chest of draws, the guy from 13 was wearing what looked like a tea cosy on his head, white t-shirt and blue trousers.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16, Richborough Close, St Mary Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Approx. 3 large potholes, 31st August
item.description:
The potholes have been there for at least 6 months. I'm concerned the damage this is causing to my car as I love nearby and travel this road regularly.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mayplace Road East, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Silver vauxhall arrived on transporter then left at top of Richborough Close, 31st August
item.description:
Silver vauxhall corsa arrived by vehicle transporter on Friday 29th August. Guy from 1 Richborough Close was working on the vehicle and jacked and removed the front wheel, the vehicle still has the jack under the front wheel and has just been abandoned without vehicle tax. Subsequently because of this vehicle other can't park so are double parking or blocking the pavements. Silver vauxhall corsa NJ58 KVV.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16, Richborough Close, St Mary Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Many Lime bikes scattered in road, 30th August
item.description:
Once again many Lime bike are obstructing the road and pavement, this time many are tipped over. There are always far too many bikes for the area in this location. It’s dangerous, obstructive and invites noise pollution for local residents due to the amount of people in one place.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1-13, Triangle Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Defective Street Light, 30th August
item.description:
Opposite Nando’s restaurant, 16-17 Market Place, Bexleyheath: Please fix a defective street light which is not turning on at night - picture attached.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Market Place, Barnehurst, London

item.title: Littering to lamposts in area., 30th August
item.description:
20+flags appeared fixed to lampposts etc by a group of men with a pick up truck . I assume they are not officially in place due to the adhoc nature of placement, they are flying at half mast and many are upside down!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lance Corporal Nicky Mason Way
Report on FixMyStreet
